description: Orfus is one of the three leaders of Chaos Choir, an Edel Raid who harbors hatred for humans. She has short brown hair and glasses. The Edel Raid stone is located in the middle of her chest. She possesses a book written in ancient text which comprise of the history and prophecies of Edel Garden as well as the powerful spells she casts. She reacts with Jilltail and Aljeena. Her ultimate plan was to use Ren`s power to create a new world where Edel Raids ruled over humans. She was the one who had killed Cou and severed the tie as Pleasure and Edel Raid, unshocked to see him alive after Eve restored Cou`s life. Cou and Ren`s love awoke the forgotten song sung by humans and Edel Raids, breaking off Orfus and the others` react with Ren. At the anime`s end, along with Jilltail and Aljeena, Orfus agrees to join forces with Arc Aile for a brighter future.
name: Orfus
